ResiliencePower.NAME: Resilience
DESCRIPTIONS: This turn, self-inflicted damage is reduced by 50%

DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, gain #b

DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, gain Block equal to your Ki times #b

DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your next turn, lose #b

DESCRIPTIONS: HP for each excess #yKi you generate.

MasterOfPainPower.NAME: Master Of Pain
DESCRIPTIONS: You do not take damage from self-inflicted sources.

DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, heal #b

PushThroughPower.NAME: Pushing Through
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you receive attack damage, gain #b

DivinityPower.NAME: Divinity
DESCRIPTIONS: This turn, whenever you gain Preparation, gain #b

DilationPower.NAME: Dilation
DESCRIPTIONS: The damage dealt to you this turn is received at the end of your next turn.
